certifications.description: Certificate Of Excellence provided to students securing 90 percent and above in their course
certifications.title: Introduction To C++

projects.name: Real-Time-City-Forecasts
projects.description: Developed a weather application using JavaScript and the OpenWeatherMap API to fetch and display real-time data, including temperature, wind speed, and humidity, for any city based on user input, providing users with quick and accurate weather updates to assist in daily planning and decision-making. Implemented optimization techniques to enhance API call efficiency and reduce data fetch times, ensuring a seamless and responsive user experience.

projects.name: Chore-Robot
projects.description: Created an interactive web-based game called Chore Robot, where players choose between three doors to avoid finding the robot and win by successfully opening two non-robot doors. Project highlights the efficiency and optimization, particularly in minimizing load times and resource usage, as well as enhancing my proficiency in JavaScript and game logic design.

experiences.description: Completed an internship in web development with Code Alpha, gaining hands-on experience in building and maintaining web applications using modern technologies and best practices. Developed three impactful projects: a Temperature Converter, a Background Changer, and a dynamic Front Page, showcasing my proficiency in web development and UI/UX design.
